channel.title: Web SDK on Cumulocity IoT Guides
channel.description: Recent content in Web SDK on Cumulocity IoT Guides

item.title: Overview
item.description: This Web SDK guide provides information on the Web SDK which enables you to develop web applications on top of our platform, communicate through our API and apply UI components to your custom application.

item.title: Brief background
item.description: As the web ecosystem evolves, as a platform we evolve with it - while assuring to keep upgrade paths as smooth as possible and keep extensions working properly with very little changes.

item.title: Web SDK for plugins
item.description: Web SDK for plugins is still based on Angular JS. We are currently working on an Angular-based solution which will replace the existing Web SDK for plugins in the future.

item.title: Troubleshooting
item.description: This section lists common isses and workarounds.
